name: Godot Asteroids
description:
Godot Asteroids is a clone of the original Asteroids for the Atari.

As the original, the objective is to avoid being shot and and to get a high score.


When you destroy all enemies, the next wave starts. The difficulty increases in each wave.

Enemies give you points:

Enemy
Points Big asteroid
20 Medium asteroid
50 Small asteroid
100
UFO1000

You get an aditional live every 10.000 points (you can have up to 5 lives in total).

You can use your rocket's thrust flames to block ufo's laser shoots.
